nodes.text: This Dathomirian female was the mother of Dark Acolyte Asajj Ventress. When her daughter was still an infant, she was forced to give her up to Hal'Sted, a Siniteen criminal, in order to protect her Nightsisters clan, a decision which caused both her and Mother Talzin great pain. Her daughter would eventually return to her home and become a Nightsister herself.
